title: There is a policeman running around this board...
body: And he is whining at everyone to post the bug 'correctly'. Well I think it is humorous everyone is coming here to post the same problem and we are enjoying. Everyone is suffering from the same 'bug' and they are letting riot know here. Leave 'em alone.

replies.body: Riot wont care unless you properly post though.  read the rules https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug

>  post the bug 'correctly'

A new meme is born
